issue.title: [CF 107] Target/ Unit's Cooldowns
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 4.0.1.104, Microsoft Windows NT 5.1.2600 Service Pack 3

Installed Version

TellMeWhen 3.0.3

Description

It would be amazing if this could track opponent's cooldowns and interrupts. Like adding a 'unit to watch' list for the 'cooldown' icon type. That would make this invaluable for arenas!

Installed Addons

Ace3 - Release-r981 Addon Control Panel - 3.3.13 Atlasloot Enhanced - v6.02.00 AutoBar - 4.0.3.12 Bagnon - 2.15.2 Bartender4 - 4.4.15 Doom_CooldownPulse - 1.2.5 ErrorFilter - v2.0 Fontifier - 0.3.2 GatherMate2 - 1.12 GearScore / PlayerScore - Version 4.2.01 Genie - 4.2_gamma Gladius - v2.0.11-beta GoGoMount - 4.0.41 HatTrick - 4.0.0.2-Release IceHUD - 1.7.4.2 MikScrollingBattleText - v5.5.91 Minutiae (Automation) - v1.0 RC4 MoveAnything - 11.4.5 Prat 3.0 - 3.4.15 SmartBuff - 4.0g SmartTargeting - SmartTargeting 1.6 Tabbed Dungeon Browser (tabDB) - tabDB2.4a2 TellMeWhen - TellMeWhen 3.0.3 Tidy Plates - 5.15.2 Tidy Plates: Threat Plates - 4.0-b TipTac - 10.12.06 TomTom - v40000-1.0.9 TourGuide - 4.0.0.57-Beta Turn In - 2.1.1 ZoneLevelInfo - 1.4.6

comments.body:
I may add it, but users would have to manually enter the cooldown duration because there is no way to track this otherwise. This could present some false information if there is a talent that reduces the cooldown. I'll think about it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
